description:
Sora finally landed the part that could make her wildest dreams come true, but if she can’t figure out a way to breathe new life into the role of a broken-hearted mermaid, her days as a leading lady will be numbered!
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: El reto de un papel principal
Le grand mur devant le premier rôle
主役への すごい 壁
